title: Writing your first code
description: Learn what coding is and how to write your first lines of code.

title: Variables and Repeats
description: Learn how to create, update and use variables, and learn repeats.

title: Conditionals
description: Learn about if and else keywords, and functions that return things.

title: Functions
description: This week we learn how to make our own functions!

title: Lists
description: This week we learn our first compound data structure - lists.

title: Recap Week
description: We recap everything we've learned so far and introduce your first major project!

title: Dictionaries
description: We look at dictionaries, break, continue and loop counters.

title: Objects
description: We explore the first step into Object-Oriented Programming: objects

title: Methods
description: We explore the second small step into Object-Oriented Programming: methods

title: Classes
description: We finally start to build our own classes!

title: Intro to HTML/CSS/JS
description: We say hello to the core web technologies
